official_title: A bill to authorize action by the Army Corps of Engineers in Franklin County, Missouri to prevent flood damage along the Meramec River.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to undertake measures to prevent flood damage to communities along the Meramec River in Franklin County, Missouri.

titles.title: A bill to authorize action by the Army Corps of Engineers in Franklin County, Missouri to prevent flood damage along the Meramec River.
